original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañhārambhakathā
analyzed: meṇḍaka pañha ārambha kathā

original: Upāsakaguṇavagga
analyzed: upāsaka guṇa vagga

original: 5. Ācariyaguṇa
analyzed: ācariya guṇa

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ayaṁ bhūmibhāgo aṭṭha mantadosavivajjito, ahañca loke paramo mantisahāyo,
analyzed: bhante nāgasena ayam bhūmi bhāgaḥ manta dosa vivajjitaḥ aham ca loke paramaḥ manti sahāyaḥ

original: guyhamanurakkhī cāhaṁ yāvāhaṁ jīvissāmi tāva guyhamanurakkhissāmi, aṭṭhahi ca me
analyzed: guyham anurakkhī ca aham yāva aham jīvissāmi tāva guyham anurakkhissāmi aṭṭhahi ca me

original: kāraṇehi buddhi pariṇāmaṁ gatā, dullabho etarahi mādiso antevāsī, sammā paṭipanne
analyzed: kāraṇehi buddhi pariṇāmam gatā dullabhaḥ etarahi mādisaḥ antevāsī sammā paṭipanne

original: antevāsike ye ācariyānaṁ pañcavīsati ācariyaguṇā, tehi guṇehi ācariyena sammā paṭipajjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: antevāsike ye ācariyānam pañcavīsati ācariya guṇā tehi guṇehi ācariyena sammā

original: Katame pañcavīsati guṇā?
analyzed: katame pañcavīsati guṇā

original: Idha, bhante nāgasena, ācariyena antevāsimhi satataṁ samitaṁ ārakkhā upaṭṭhapetabbā,
analyzed: idha bhante nāgasena ācariyena antevāsimhi satatam samitam ārakkhā upaṭṭhapetabbā

original: asevanasevanā jānitabbā, pamattāppamattā jānitabbā, seyyāvakāso jānitabbo, gelaññaṁ
analyzed: asevana sevanā jānitabbā pamattā appamattā jānitabbā seyyā avakāsaḥ jānitabbaḥ gelañña

original: jānitabbaṁ, bhojanassa laddhāladdhaṁ jānitabbaṁ, viseso jānitabbo, pattagataṁ saṁvibhajitabbaṁ,
analyzed: bhojanassa laddha aladdham visesaḥ jānitabbaḥ patta gatam

original: assāsitabbo ‘mā bhāyi, attho te abhikkamatī’ti, ‘iminā puggalena paṭicaratī’ti paṭicāro
analyzed: assāsitabbaḥ mā bhāyi atthaḥ te abhikkamati iti iminā puggalena paṭicarati iti paṭicāraḥ

original: jānitabbo, gāme paṭicāro jānitabbo, vihāre paṭicāro jānitabbo, na tena hāso davo
analyzed: jānitabbaḥ gāme paṭicāraḥ jānitabbaḥ vihāre paṭicāraḥ jānitabbaḥ na tena hāsaḥ davaḥ

original: kātabbo, tena saha ālāpo kātabbo, chiddaṁ disvā adhivāsetabbaṁ, sakkaccakārinā bhavitabbaṁ,
analyzed: kātabbaḥ tena saha ālāpaḥ kātabbaḥ chiddam disvā adhivāsetabba sakkacca kārinā bhavitabba

original: akhaṇḍakārinā bhavitabbaṁ, arahassakārinā bhavitabbaṁ, niravasesakārinā bhavitabbaṁ,
analyzed: akhaṇḍa kārinā bhavitabba arahassa kārinā bhavitabba niravasesa kārinā bhavitabba

original: ‘janemimaṁ sippesū’ti janakacittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ, ‘kathaṁ ayaṁ na parihāyeyyā’ti
analyzed: janemi imam sippesu iti janaka cittam katham ayam na parihāyeyya ati

original: vaḍḍhicittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ, ‘balavaṁ imaṁ karomi sikkhābalenā’ti cittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ,
analyzed: vaḍḍhi cittam upaṭṭhapetabba balavan imam karomi sikkhā balena ati cittam upaṭṭhapetabba

original: mettacittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ, āpadāsu na vijahitabbaṁ, karaṇīye nappamajjitabbaṁ,
analyzed: metta cittam upaṭṭhapetabba āpadāsu na vijahitabba karaṇīye na ppamajjitabba

original: khalite dhammena paggahetabboti.
analyzed: khalite dhammena paggahetabbaḥ ti

original: Ime kho, bhante, pañcavīsati ācariyassa ācariyaguṇā, tehi guṇehi mayi sammā paṭipajjassu,
analyzed: ime kho bhante pañcavīsati ācariyassa ācariya guṇā tehi guṇehi mayi sammā paṭipajjassu

original: saṁsayo me, bhante, uppanno, atthi meṇḍakapañhā jinabhāsitā, anāgate addhāne tattha
analyzed: sa sayaḥ me bhante uppannaḥ atthi meṇḍaka pañhā jina bhāsitā anāgate addhāne tattha

original: viggaho uppajjissati, anāgate ca addhāne dullabhā bhavissanti tumhādisā buddhimanto,
analyzed: viggahaḥ uppajjissati anāgate ca addhāne dullabhāḥ bhavissanti tumhādisāḥ buddhimanto

original: tesu me pañhesu cakkhuṁ dehi paravādānaṁ niggahāyā”ti.
analyzed: tesu me pañhesu cakkhum dehi paravādānam niggahāya ati
